00055 #ifndef INDRI_INFERENCENETWORK_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_INFERENCENETWORK_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/BeliefNode.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/EvaluatorNode.hpp"
00060 #include "indri/ListIteratorNode.hpp"
00061 #include "indri/TermScoreFunction.hpp"
00062 #include "indri/Repository.hpp"
00063 #include "indri/FieldListIterator.hpp"
00064 #include "indri/DocListFrequencyIterator.hpp"
00065 
00066 class InferenceNetwork {
00067 public:
00068   typedef std::map< std::string, EvaluatorNode::MResults > MAllResults;
00069 
00070   //
00071   // MAllResults stores results indexed first by node name, then second by the node's 
00072   // result name.  For instance, to retrieve occurrence counts from a 
00073   // ContextCountAccumulator named "bd45a", you'd type 'results["bd45a"]["occurrences"]'.
00074   //
00075 
00076 private:
00077   std::vector<class indri::index::FieldListIterator*> _fieldIterators;
00078   std::vector<class DocPositionInfoList*> _docIterators;
00079   std::vector<class indri::index::DocListFrequencyIterator*> _freqIterators;
00080   std::vector<ListIteratorNode*> _listIteratorNodes;
00081   std::vector<BeliefNode*> _beliefNodes;
00082   std::vector<EvaluatorNode*> _evaluators;
00083   std::vector<EvaluatorNode*> _complexEvaluators;
00084   std::vector<TermScoreFunction*> _scoreFunctions;
00085   Repository& _repository;
00086   MAllResults _results;
00087 
00088   void _moveToDocument( int candidate );
00089   int _nextCandidateDocument();
00090   void _evaluateDocument( int document );
00091 
00092 public:
00093   InferenceNetwork( Repository& repository );
00094   ~InferenceNetwork();
00095 
00096   const std::vector<EvaluatorNode*>& getEvaluators() const;
00097   const EvaluatorNode* getFirstEvaluator() const;
00098 
00099   void addDocIterator( DocPositionInfoList* posInfoList );
00100   void addFieldIterator( indri::index::FieldListIterator* fieldIterator );
00101   void addFrequencyIterator( indri::index::DocListFrequencyIterator* frequencyIterator );
00102   void addListNode( ListIteratorNode* listNode );
00103   void addBeliefNode( BeliefNode* beliefNode );
00104   void addEvaluatorNode( EvaluatorNode* evaluatorNode );
00105   void addComplexEvaluatorNode( EvaluatorNode* complexEvaluator );
00106   void addScoreFunction( TermScoreFunction* scoreFunction );
00107   const MAllResults& evaluate();
00108 };
00109 
00110 #endif // INDRI_INFERENCENETWORK_HPP
